articles.author: Danielle Garrand
articles.title: Starbucks offering free coffee to health care workers and first responders for the entire month of December - CBS News
articles.description: "We want to show our deep gratitude for those who support and protect us every day with a small gesture of kindness and a cup of coffee," the company said.
articles.content: First responders and health care workers can pickup a free cup of Starbucks coffee for the entire month of December, the coffee chain announced on Tuesday. The company said the perk was "in response … [+2466 chars]

articles.author: Parija Kavilanz, CNN Business
articles.title: Sephora is opening up mini shops inside Kohl's stores - CNN
articles.description: Sephora is set to open mini shops inside Kohl's stores, with the first 200 locations debuting in fall of 2021. It's part of an effort to reach more customers outside the mall.
